---
title: intro
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureHtmlElements:
        - ['a.sidebar-logo-link']
        - ['a.navbar-brand-logo']
---

This test verifies that setting `navbar.logo: false` disables the navbar logo
in a book project even when `_brand.yml` defines a logo.

Sidebar logo will be the brand logo by default.
